graph_title: 12.b.1.1 Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
indicator_available: Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
indicator_name: Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
page_content:
***Non-statistical indicator***

For 2022:

1.National Regional Development Strategy (NRDS) for the years 2022-2028, HG no.40 of 26.01.2022;

2. The Government's action plan for the years 2021-2022;

3. The national development strategy "European Moldova 2030";

4. The re-technological and energy efficiency program of small and medium-sized enterprises;

5. The European Village Program.

ro.graph_title: 12.b.1.1 Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
ro.indicator_available: Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
ro.indicator_name: Number of sustainable tourism strategic documents (strategies, policies, programs, etc.) with agreed monitoring and evaluation tools
ro.page_content:
***Indicator non-statistic***

Pentru anul 2022:

1.Strategia Națională de Dezvoltare Regională (SNDR) pentru anii 2022-2028, HG nr.40 din 26.01.2022;

2. Planul de acţiuni al Guvernului pentru anii 2021-2022;

3. Strategia națională de dezvoltare „Moldova Europeană 2030”;

4. Programul de retehnologizare și eficiență energetică a întreprinderilor mici și mijlocii;

5. Programul Satul European.
